title: Add unit test target and initial test coverage
description: No test target exists in project.yml. Need to: 1) Add NetmonitorTests target to XcodeGen project.yml 2) Create initial test files 3) Wire up scheme for test action 4) Add baseline tests for core services (NetworkMonitorService, PingService, DNSLookupService)
close_reason: Test target added to project.yml, 4 test suites with 8 tests all passing: PingServiceTests (3), WakeOnLANServiceTests (3), DNSLookupServiceTests (1), NetworkMonitorServiceTests (1)
